posts.content:
28th and 29th March, Sandown Park, Esher. KT10 9AJ

http://www.volksworld.com/volksworld-show

The Volskworld Show is nearly upon us again, which means another club display. Consequently I are looking for buses to show in the line-up. If you own a nice, shinny, clean bus your club needs you! Buses can be shown the whole weekend or just Saturday or just Sunday, it's your call. You will receive a free ticket for you and the occupants of your bus (but donâ€™t take the Michael!!) for the whole weekend . Buses can be removed from the club line up each evening to camp in if you wish to do so. This year the organisers have requested that we put togenther a display of clean shiney splits (15 only so get on it!!), so if you have a bus that matches this criteria you need to geta picture of it to me, including your name and regestration number. Please mail these details to me r.james @ wintoncapital. com (don't copy and paste this email add as I have added spaces to stop spam).

Also I am organising the usual "not so shinny" or "anything goes" line up, just outside the main entrance, again if you own a bus that suits this line up please support your club and get involved!

All the best and see you at the show

Regards Rikki (07802 884 583)
Just to be clear is it free ticket for shiny buses inside or are there some available for outside line up too? Thanks.

Martin59mango wrote:
Just to be clear is it free ticket for shiny buses inside or are there some available for outside line up too? Thanks.


Sorry, just inside fella
